Trample, first strike, haste
[i]Swordbreaker+[/i] – Whenever Sylvain, Great Knight enters or attacks, destroy up to two target artifacts. For each permanent destroyed this way, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
[i]Lance of Ruin[/i] – Whenever Sylvain deals combat damage to a player, exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard and copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana costs.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {3}{R}{W}
